Author: dynamicsystem
Text: 1,200 is quite low actually, most people still find themselves binging when they eat that amount. Also, when someone begins recovery it will seem like they’re “binging” because the amount of food is so excessive, but in reality that is a normal part of recovery and it’s just your body trying to get enough food to fix all the damage that was caused by restriction. anyways, it seems like recovery isn’t your goal rn, so maybe try starting at a high intake and slowly tapering down each day or week?
